text:
Moosejaw | Ecommerce System Administrator | Madison Heights, MI | Onsite

Looking to work on a small (10~ person), tight-knit web team where your voice will be heard and respected from day one? This position will be in charge of the ecosystem of the Linux servers (including builds and decomms), handling the migration from AWS to Microsoft Azure, as well as maintaining all network security functions. More info here: https://www.moosejaw.com/moosejaw/shop/content_jobs____
